column4: so I want to be able to run WoW with beryl running also.  I've got a Radeon 9800 Pro, which is an ATI card.  According to http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=344271 I need to have Direct rendering enabled, but when I $glxinfo | grep render it says I don't have Direct rendering enabled.  how can I enable it?  DRI in xorg.conf?
can you tell edmon how to configure the 9800?
sure, what's the problem, simple 2d rendering, or 3d stuff?
not sure, he was asking for help with it, and nobody responded, edmon you still with us?
